user.title: Configure printer connection
user.description: Enter the connection details for your ESC/POS network printer.

data_description.host: IP address or hostname of the printer.
data_description.profile: Select your printer model or Auto-detect. Choose 'Custom' to enter a profile name manually.

codepage.title: Printer settings
codepage.description: Configure encoding and printing defaults for your printer.

data_description.codepage: Character encoding/codepage for text. Choose 'Custom' to enter a codepage manually.
data_description.line_width: Number of characters per line (columns). Choose 'Custom' to enter a value manually.
data_description.default_cut: Default paper cut mode after printing.

custom_profile.title: Custom printer profile
custom_profile.description: Enter the profile name as defined in escpos-printer-db.

data_description.custom_profile: The exact profile key from escpos-printer-db (e.g., 'TM-T88V', 'default').

custom_line_width.title: Custom line width
custom_line_width.description: Enter the number of characters per line.

data_description.custom_line_width: Number of characters that fit on one line (e.g., 32, 42, 48).

error.invalid_line_width: Invalid line width. Must be a positive number.

init.title: Printer options
init.description: Configure printer settings. Changing the profile will reset encoding options to defaults.

data_description.profile: Select your printer model. Changing this will reset encoding options.
data_description.default_cut: Default paper cut mode after printing.
data_description.keepalive: Keep the connection open between print jobs.
data_description.status_interval: How often to check printer status (0 to disable).

custom_profile.title: Custom printer profile
custom_profile.description: Enter the profile name as defined in escpos-printer-db.

data_description.custom_profile: The exact profile key from escpos-printer-db.

custom_line_width.title: Custom line width
custom_line_width.description: Enter the number of characters per line.

data_description.custom_line_width: Number of characters that fit on one line.

print_text.name: Print Text (Raw Encoding)
print_text.description: Print text to the ESC/POS printer using raw encoding.

print_text_utf8.name: Print Text (UTF-8)
print_text_utf8.description: Print UTF-8 text with automatic transcoding to the printer's codepage. Converts special characters like curly quotes, em-dashes, and accented letters to their closest equivalents.

text.name: Text
text.description: UTF-8 text content to print. Special characters will be automatically converted.

data.name: Data
data.description: Data content to encode in the QR code.

size.name: Size
size.description: Module size for the QR code (1–16).

align.name: Alignment
align.description: Horizontal alignment for the QR code.

print_image.name: Print image
print_image.description: Print an image by URL or local path.

image.name: Image
image.description: Path or URL to the image to print.

high_density.name: High density
high_density.description: Use high density image mode if supported.

feed.name: Feed
feed.description: Feed the paper by a number of lines.

font.name: Font
font.description: Font for human-readable text (A or B).

align_ct.name: Center align
align_ct.description: Center the barcode on the line.

force_software.name: Force software renderer
force_software.description: Force software rendering mode to improve compatibility.

duration.name: Duration
duration.description: Duration of each beep in units supported by the printer.
